text: Nia gowaa huogodoo o tenua, nia daangada o nia madawaawa Israel la gu lagalagamaaloo i nadau mehanga, gu helekai boloo, “Di king go David ne daa mai gidaadou gi daha mo tadau hagadaumee, gei ne daa mai labelaa gidaadou gi daha mo digau Philistia, gei dolomeenei, mee ne hana gu diiagi tenua deenei, i dana dama go Absalom.
